author: Courtney Connley
title: Tina Tchen will become president and chief executive of Time's Up
description: The advocacy organization, Time's Up, announced Monday that the longtime lawyer and former Obama aide will step into her new role as president and chief executive on Nov. 1.
content:
Lawyer Tina Tchen, who once served as chief of staff to Michelle Obama, has been named president and chief executive of Time's Up, according to The New York Times.
Tchen will replace Lisa Borders, who resigned from the chief executive role earlier this year … [+2399 chars]
